duties_responsibilities.duty: Create project charter and work plan, track budget and schedule progress via appropriate metrics.
Establish project organization and methodologies, and define roles and responsibilities.
Design, plan, and coordinate work teams from different divisions within the department.
Create and implement a communication plan.
Build an effective team, assign tasks to team members, and evaluate outcomes.
Identify, track, and ensure resolution of issues and removal of barriers.
Follow standard project management industry practices and understand business and technical objectives of a project.
Document risks and develop mitigation plans.
Communicate to stakeholders and project sponsor, manage scope, and negotiate resources.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor Degree in Information Systems or equivalent combination of education and 4 years of experience; Project Management Professional (PMP) Certification or successful completion of the VITA Project Manager Development Program within 1 year of the start.
